lead_paragraph: New Zealand great Dan Carter has called for the introduction of a bonus point system to encourage more attacking and breathe fresh life into the Six Nations.

headline.print_headline: Carter Calls for Bonus Points to Liven Up Six Nations
headline.main: Carter Calls for Bonus Points to Liven Up Six Nations

snippet: New Zealand great Dan Carter has called for the introduction of a bonus point system to encourage more attacking and breathe fresh life into the Six Nations....
